name: indent-rain
description: Makes indentation easier to read, forked from indent-rainbow

indentRain.includedLanguages.description: For which languages indent-rainbow should be activated. When empty will use for all languages.

indentRain.excludedLanguages.description: For which languages indent-rainbow should be deactivated. When left empty will ignore.

indentRain.ignoreErrorLanguages.description: For which languages indent-rainbow should skip indent error detection (use '*' to deavtivate errors for all languages).

indentRain.updateDelay.description: The delay in ms until the editor gets updated.

indentRain.indentSetter.description: Automatically change indent settings for languages (see README.md for details).

indentRain.errorColor.description: Indent color for when there is an error in the indentation, for example if you have your tabs set to 2 spaces but the indent is 3 spaces. Can be any type of web based color format (hex, rgba, rgb).

indentRain.tabmixColor.description: Indent color for when there is a mix between spaces and tabs in the indentation. Can be any type of web based color format (hex, rgba, rgb) or a empty string(to be disabled this coloring).

indentRain.ignoreLinePatterns.description: Skip error highlighting for RegEx patterns. Defaults to c/cpp decorated block and full line comments.

indentRain.colors.description: An array with color (hex, rgba, rgb) strings which are used as colors, can be any length.
